alert.note: Alert for Durham; Granville; Orange; Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:55PM EDT until June 16 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Person County in central North Carolina... Northern Orange County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Granville County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Durham County in central North Carolina... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 354 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elmo to near Camp Springs, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Roxboro, Hillsborough, Mebane, Rougemont, Concord, Carr, Efland, Mayo Reservoir, Schley and Bethel Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly. Prepare immediately for deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
